# Release draft template

Use this template when creating a release. Draft the release with the version tag and link any deployed assets or verification URLs.

## Changelog

- Added: ...
- Fixed: ...
- Docs: ...

## Verification

Include links to verified contracts (Etherscan/Polygonscan) and any deployed site URLs.

## Artifacts

- demo/demo.gif
- build artifact (optional)
